name: Slightly Angry Max
description:
Made for Ludum Dare game jam in under 48 hours.

Retro-styled shooter. Max is stranded on a tiny, post-apocalyptic desert island, the last dry land on earth. Programmed solo; this was my first Ludum Dare (or any jam for that matter).

Made with Unity (C#), Gimp and SFXR/BFXR

Open source assets used:

  • Base sprites: CobraLad - see Opengameart
  • Base Sprites: keith karnage - see Opengameart
  • Music: Juhani Junkala - see https://juhanijunkala.com
  • Explosion Sprite base, fonts: Kenney - see http://kenney.nl

Released under CC-BY-SA 3.0 License, as per license of assets used in game.
